entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @TrumpWarRoom @realDonaldTrump That’s what apologies look like. That’s what people say when they’re wrong. You should try it, you have had at least as many opportunities as there are people who have tested #COVID19 positive. Then maybe your @VP will also figure out how to apologize too. #WorthlessLiarInChief
